'''An Island Without Thieves''' is a [[Random Event]] that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
#Destroy the suspicious [[Treasure Hoarders]] {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Handyman*3;Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When triggering the event)
:'''Paimon''': Oh, look who's here! It's those Treasure Hoarder guys again.
:'''Paimon''': And they're as suspicious as usual. Let's drive them out!
{{Dialogue end}}
